name: Staff of Hoarding
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Hoarding

Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, identify, legend lore, locate object, magic aura, secret chest

sections.body:
This gorgeous teak shaft has many gold and silver coins hammered into it. It allows use of the following spells:

  • identify (1 charge)
  • locate object (1 charge)
  • magic aura (1 charge)
  • secret chest (2 charges)
  • legend lore (3 charges)
sections.name: Description
